meanings.definition: Causing a concussion or characterized by concussion.
meanings.sent1: The concussive blast from the fireworks startled the dog.
meanings.sent2: The concussive hit to the head left him dazed and confused.
meanings.sent3: The concussive sound of the thunder made the little girl jump.
meanings.sent4: The concussive effect of the loud music reverberated through the room.
meanings.sent5: The concussive impact of the collision was felt throughout the stadium.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a concussion.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor explained the concussive symptoms she might experience.
meanings.sent2: The athlete followed the concussive protocol after the injury.
meanings.sent3: The concussive nature of the accident led to increased safety measures.
meanings.sent4: The concussive risk in contact sports is a growing concern.
meanings.sent5: The concussive impact on his memory was concerning to his family.

meanings.sent1: The concussive from the explosion could be felt miles away.
meanings.sent2: The building shook from the concussive of the wrecking ball.
meanings.sent3: The concussive of the drumbeat set the rhythm for the dancers.
meanings.sent4: The concussive of the earthquake caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent5: The concussive of the collision left a lasting impression on the witnesses.
